text: John Ficarra is an American magazine editor and publisher. He has been the editor-in-chief of MAD Magazine since 1984, sharing the same position for most of that time with Nick Meglin. He has been one of the editorial staff of the magazine for more than 25 years. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Living people Category:American publishers Category:American cartoonists Category:American comics artists
title: John Ficarra
